segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen, and everything seems calm at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is methodically drying a plate by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window illuminates the garden outside beautifully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But hold on, the sink's overflowing— water everywhere!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, and the puddle's at her feet; she could slip badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, a boy' s on a stool reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tipping— oh no, he might fall from that height!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's close by, reaching up; if it collapses, she'll be in the way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The wet floor makes it even more dangerous for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets are open, dishes stacked— lots could break if there's a tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I' m really worried about what happens next in this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view just heightens the tension inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Please, let no one get hurt from this carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR
